description: Properties of an operations event definition shall be defined as operations event definition properties. An operations event definition shall be further characterized through zero or more operations event definition properties. Operations event definition properties may contain nested operations event definition properties
title: Operations event definition property
$comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.02-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 2: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

links.dtdl:description: If the operations event definition supports an operations event class, the operations event class property(s) are applied in the operations event definition property(s). This operations event definition property maps to the corresponding operations event class property
The nested operations event definition property(s) makes up part of this operations event definition property as the whole

links.dtdl:name: description
links.dtdl:description: Additional information and description about the operations event definition property

propertyType.title: Property type
propertyType.description: Defines the type of the property.

oneOf.title: Class Type
oneOf.description: The property value is defined for the class and there is no value associated with an instance

oneOf.title: Instance Type
oneOf.description: the property value of the class is undefined

oneOf.title: Default Type
oneOf.description: The property value is defined for the class as the default instance value, but individual instances of the class may redefine specific values.

value.title: Value
value.description: The value, set of values, or range of the property.

valueUnitOfMeasure.title: Value unit of measure
valueUnitOfMeasure.description: The unit of measure of the associated property value
